name: SWAT Fly Car Shooting 3D
description:
SWAT Fly Car Shooting 3D is perfect game with thrilling cop car driving experience of flying cars!Time to test your airplane pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time with beautiful unique police cars
FEATURES:

A real police car simulator in the sky
Check your Police Car Driving Skills
Improve Airplane Flight Ability
Stunning HD Graphics with Epic City
Realistic and dynamic car physics
Advanced airplane flight physics
